title: Implant to better track brain chemical gone rogue after neurotrauma

title_detail.value: Implant to better track brain chemical gone rogue after neurotrauma

summary: Engineers have built a tiny, flexible sensor that is faster and more precise than past attempts at tracking a brain chemical elevated in brain diseases and neurotrauma.

summary_detail.value: Engineers have built a tiny, flexible sensor that is faster and more precise than past attempts at tracking a brain chemical elevated in brain diseases and neurotrauma.
